meta.description:
- GP0310H

A calendar with the date of  the Chernobyl catastrophe (Saturday, 26th April 1986) lies amongst syringes, at an outpatient department in Pripyat's hospital. House physicians had prepared a vaccinations campaign for the last week of April 1986. However, on Sunday 27th the entire city of Pripyat was evacuated because of the Chernobyl catastrophe and physicians could never go back. Today Pripyat is like a ghost town.
